bug_verdicts.original_description: SilenceGrafanaRuleDrawer never renders for rules from list view because it requires RulerRuleDTO but only GrafanaPromRuleDTO is passed
bug_verdicts.verified_description: In the list view, RuleActionsButtons.V2 is invoked with only promRule, so clicking 'Silence notifications' toggles showSilenceDrawer but the drawer render is gated on rulerRuleType.grafana.alertingRule(rule) (requires a RulerGrafanaRuleDTO), meaning the SilenceGrafanaRuleDrawer never renders.
bug_verdicts.notes: Re-verified on pr-5: GrafanaRuleListItem passes <RuleActionsButtons promRule={rule} ... /> (no rulerRule), while RuleActionsButtons.V2 renders the drawer only when rulerRuleType.grafana.alertingRule(rule) && showSilenceDrawer (RuleActionsButtons.V2:104-105). AlertRuleMenu can still show the silence menu item based on promRule abilities, so the click has no visible effect. Line number is off by +1 vs draft (conditional starts at 104).

false_positive_verdicts.original_comment: The rendered GrafanaRuleListItem is missing the required key prop for React list items. This can cause rendering issues when the list order changes.
false_positive_verdicts.original_reasoning: The key prop IS present: `key={promRule.uid}` in GrafanaGroupLoader.tsx. The golden comment is incorrect.
false_positive_verdicts.notes: Re-verified on pr-5: GrafanaGroupLoader renders <GrafanaRuleListItem key={promRule.uid} ... /> (public/app/features/alerting/unified/rule-list/GrafanaGroupLoader.tsx).
